GLOBAL_REGISTRY_CLIENT - Static variable in class fr.upmc.components.cvm.AbstractDistributedCVM
Global registry client; singleton.
GlobalRegistry - Class in fr.upmc.components.registry
The class GlobalRegistry implements the global registry for the component model that registers connection information to remotely access components through their ports.
GlobalRegistry(String) - Constructor for class fr.upmc.components.registry.GlobalRegistry
create a registry object, using the configuration file to know the number of clients that will connect, and therefore that will have to disconnect for the registry to terminate its execution.
GlobalRegistry.ProcessLookup - Class in fr.upmc.components.registry
The class ProcessLookup implements a runnable task used to look up the registry for a given key.
GlobalRegistry.ProcessPut - Class in fr.upmc.components.registry
The class ProcessPut implements a runnable task used to update the registry with the association of a given key to a given value.
GlobalRegistry.ProcessRemove - Class in fr.upmc.components.registry
The class ProcessRemove implements a runnable task used to remove the association of a given key from the registry.
GlobalRegistry.ServiceRunnable - Class in fr.upmc.components.registry
The class ServiceRunnable implements the behaviour of the registry exchanging with one client; its processes the requests from the clients until the latter explicitly disconnects with a "shutdown" request of implicitly with a null string request.
globalRegistryClient - Variable in class fr.upmc.components.connectors.ConnectionBuilder
 
GlobalRegistryClient - Class in fr.upmc.components.registry
